result.title: how to solve this
result.content:
i tried with this problem from uri online judge but it always gives me 100% wrong please help me to find where is the wrong this is the link of the problemn https://www.urionlinejudge.com.br/judge/en/problems/view/1060 and this my C++ code

` #include 

using namespace std;

 int X = 0 || 1 || 2 || 3 || 4 || 5 ;

 int Z;

 int Count;

 string A;

 int main ()

 {
 cin >> A;

 for (Z=0 ; Z <= 6 ; Z++)

 { if ( A[0] >= 0 || A[1] >= 0 || A[2] >= 0 || A[3] >= 0 || A[4] >= 0 || A[5] >= 0)
 Count++;

 A[X] >= 0;
}

 cout <<Z<<" valores positivos"<<endl;

 return 0;
}`
